text:
Not convenient stop,  long walk for pedestrians and limited mobility users.

Could have been right outside the MRT exit D
Why removed bus stop ID number?
A busy bus stop with bus services heading to Central area of Singapore.
Superb place to wait for a bus. Excellent views of the road and no shortage of traffic zipping by. Highly recommended.
bus RWS8 to Sentosa RWS at VivoCity side only, cost $1, does not stop at this bus stop.
